existing_features.title: Update the discovery filters UI so the "Zona" filter is a dropdown (select) containing all departments of Uruguay as selectable options, instead of a free-text input.

new_feature_requests.summary: En filtros > zonas: permitir seleccionar cada departamento de Uruguay (lista desplegable) en vez de escribirlo manualmente

projectName: Replace zone text input with selectable Uruguay departments in Discover filters
